content: Yes, Tidal regularly hosts live streams of classical music concerts, events, and festivals, which you can watch from the comfort of your own home. You can find these events on their "TIDAL X" platform, where they showcase various live music performances from different genres, including classical music. They also offer recordings of past live events, so you can catch up on anything you might have missed. Additionally, Tidal works with a variety of classical music labels and organizations, such as the Berlin Philharmonic and the Royal Opera House, to create exclusive content for their platform, making it a one-stop-shop for classical music fans.
